sentence.Network_en: You can move the cursor by using the mouse.

sentence.Network_en: The drag cursor must visually identify the source object.
sentence.Network_cn: 拖动光标必须在视觉上表示源对象.

sentence.Network_en: Movable splitters should always advertise their pliancy with cursor hinting.
sentence.Network_cn: 可移动的分割线应该借助光标暗示显示其受范性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a runner or running messenger): from Latin, runner', from curs- (see cursive). The sense 'sliding part of an instrument' dates from the late 16th cent

encyclopedia.content: Cursor是网页制作CSS中的光标类型，与图标文件Icon一样，是特殊类型的小位图。

entry.def: On a computer screen, the cursor is a small shape that indicates where anything that is typed by the user will appear.

means.word_mean: 1. (computer science) indicator consisting of a movable spot of light (an icon) on a visual display; moving the cursor allows the user to point to commands or screen positions

stems_affixes.word_buile: curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→像跑一样的[书写]
curs跑,发生,快速做……+ory……的→快速做完→粗略的
ex出+curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→思想跑出去→离题的
in进入+curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→跑进来的→侵入的
curs跑,发生,快速做……+or表名词→移动,跑得快→光标,指针
